translation.sw: Ɛnyɛ bere biara na ade a wɔayɛ a wɔde sɔne nsu so no yɛ adwuma yiye, enti sɛ wowɔ ho asɛm bi a, ende susuw ho sɛ wobɛtɔ nsu a wɔde agu toa mu na wɔasi ano fi adwumakuw a wɔagye din pa hɔ.

translation.en: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
translation.sw: Akwantufo betumi ahyia mmoa a wɔsɛe ade a wonhuu bi da wɔ mpɔtam a wofi.

translation.en: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.
translation.sw: Mmoa no betumi asɛe aduane, ama wo ho akeka wo, anaa nea ɛsen nyinaa no ebetumi abɔ wo yare, ɛma ɛbrɔ trɛ, anaasɛ ɛma yare sane.

translation.en: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
translation.sw: Worentumi mfa nsaneyare ahorow, anaasɛ mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu a wotumi pira anaa wokum nnipa ɔhyɛ so no nka mmoa a wɔsɛe ade no ho.

translation.en: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
translation.sw: Duty free shopping yɛ hokwan a wode bɛtɔ nneɛma a ɛtoɔ nna so wɔ mmeae ahorow bi.

translation.en: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
translation.sw: Akwantufo a wɔrekɔ aman ahorow a wɔgye tow akɛse so no betumi akora wɔn sika dodow bi so, ne titiriw wɔ nneɛma bi te sɛ anonne a nsa wom ne tawa.

translation.en: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
translation.sw: Ɛkwan a ɛda Point Marion ne Fairmont ntam no ma kaa ka yɛ den paa wɔ Buffalo-Pittsburgh Ɔkwantenpɔn no so, ɛtaa fa nwura a ate ne ho no mu.

translation.en: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
translation.sw: Sɛ wontaa nka kaa wɔ kwan a wɔnyɛɛ so yiye so a, yɛ krado sɛ wobehyia :mmeae a esiane, akwan a esua ne beae a akoakoa a wobu no ntɛm pii.

translation.en: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
translation.sw: Mmirika ho anohyeto a wɔde abɔ hɔ no wɔ fam sen afa ahorow a ɛwɔ w’akyi ne nea edi w’anim no ̶ ɛtaa yɛ 35-40 mph (56 ̶ 64 km/h) ̶ na ehia paa sɛ wodi so pɛpɛɛpɛ sen sɛ wobebu so.

translation.en: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
translation.sw: Nea ɛyɛ nwonwa mmom ne sɛ, ahomatrofo no ahoɔden no ano yɛ den wɔ ha sen ɔkwan ne fa ahorow pii, e.g. wɔ Pennsylania Wild no mu.

translation.en: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
translation.sw: German keeki ahorow no yɛ dɛ paa, na wɔ bavaria no, nneɛma wom na ɛwɔ mu ahorow pii, te sɛ nea ɛwɔ ɔman a ɛwɔ wɔn anaafo fam, Austria.

translation.en: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
translation.sw: Keeki ahorow a wɔde nnuaba ayɛ nyɛ nna, wɔnoa aprɛ de yɛ keeki ahorow afe mu no nyinaa, ne cherries ne plums a ɛba ɔhyew bere mu no.

translation.en: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.
translation.sw: Germanfo nnuane a wɔato no mu bebree wɔ almond, hazelnut ne nkate ahorow. Keeki a agye din taa ne kɔfe kuruwa baako a ano yɛ den kɔ paa.

translation.en: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
translation.sw: Sɛ wopɛ keeki ahorow a esua nanso nneɛma wom a, sɔ nea wɔfrɛ no Berliner, Pfannkuɔhen anaa Krapfen a egyina mpɔtam biara so.

translation.en: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
translation.sw: Curry yɛ aduane a wɔde nhabamma ne aduhuam ayɛ, a mogyanam anaa atosode ka ho.

translation.en: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.
translation.sw: Curry betumi ayɛ nea “emu awo” anaa “nsu wom”, na ɛno gyina nsu dodow a wode begu mu no so.

translation.en: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
translation.sw: Wɔ Northern India ne Pakistan mpɔtam ahorow a ɛwɔ aman no mfinfini no mu no, wɔde yogurt yɛ curry; wɔ Southern India ne mpoano amantam ahorow a ɛka asasetam ketawa no ho no, wɔde kube nsu na ɛtaa yɛ.

translation.en: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
translation.sw: Wɔ supɔw 17,000 a wobetumi apaw mu bi no, Indonesiafo aduane yɛ din a wɔde gyina hɔ amantam ahorow no nnuane ahorow a wobenya wɔ ɔman no mu.

translation.en: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
translation.sw: Nanso, sɛ wɔde di dwuma a woamfa biribi foforo ankyerɛkyerɛ mu a, asɛmfua no taa gyina hɔ ma aduane a efi mfinfini ne apuei afa a ɛwɔ supɔw Java mu no,

translation.en: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
translation.sw: Javafo aduane yɛ nnuane ahorow a wɔde nneɛma agu mu ma ɛyɛ dɛ, na nea Javafo no taa de gu mu ma ɛyɛ dɛ no ne nkate, mɛko, asikyire (ne titiriw no asikyire a Javafo no nya fi kube mu) ne nneɛma ahorow a wɔde gu mu ma etu hua. Seesei a wobenya wɔ supɔw kuw no nyinaa so.

translation.en: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.
translation.sw: Ntiamu yɛ ade a ɛboa nea ɔreka ɔpɔnkɔ no nan a ɛkonkon hɔ wɔ ɔpɔnkɔ atɛ no nkyɛnkyɛn no.

translation.en: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
translation.sw: Ɛboa ma nea ɔka ɔpɔnkɔ no tena so pintinn nanso ebetumi de n’akwahosan ato asiane mu efisɛ ne nan betumi aka mu.

translation.en: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
translation.sw: Sɛ wɔtow nea ɔreka ɔpɔnkɔ no fi ɔpɔnkɔ no so na ne nan ka ade a ne nan hyɛ mu no mu a, obetumi atwe wɔn wɔ fam sɛ ɔpɔnkɔ no dwane a. Nea ɛbɛboa ma saa ɔhaw yi aba fam no, wɔde nhyehyɛe ahorow bi ato akwan mu.

translation.en: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
translation.sw: Nea edi kan no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔka apɔnkɔ no hyɛ mpaboa a wɔde ka apɔnkɔ a ɛpɔ wɔ ase na n’ase no yɛ toro, na ɛyɛ teaa no.

translation.en: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
translation.sw: Nea edi hɔ no, Englandfo apɔnkɔ atɛ titiriw, no wɔ nnade bi a ɛbɔ ban a ɛma nhoma a ɛwɔ nea wɔde wɔn nan hyɛ mu eyi fi atɛ no mu sɛ nea ɔreka ɔpɔnkɔ no twe kɔ n’akyi a.

translation.en: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
translation.sw: Cochamó Ɛbɔn - Chile beae wɔforo abotan a edi kan, a wɔfrɛ no Yosemite of South Amerika, a ɛwɔ abo afasu ne ɔbotan a ni yɛ twitwiritwitwiri ahorow.

translation.en: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
translation.sw: Wɔn a wɔforo abotan a wofi wiase afanan nyinaa no gu so renya akwan foforo ahorow wɔ afasu bebree a wobetumi aforo no ho,

translation.en: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
translation.sw: Sukyerɛma so agorɔ a wodi no nsanee mu, yɛ agodi a agye din wɔde ski anaa duasini a wɔde fa sukyerɛma so hyɛ wɔn nan ase sane fa baabi a sukyerɛma akata so no.

translation.en: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
translation.sw: Ski a wɔde hyɛ nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma so no yɛ dwumadi a nnipa bebree ani gye ho nawotu kwan kodi, etɔ da wɔfrɛ no “ski bums”, wɔn akwantu no nyinaa gyina baabi pɔtee a wɔbedi saa agodi no.

translation.en: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
translation.sw: Ski a wɔde hyɛ wɔn nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma so no yɛ biribi a akyɛ yiye paa ̶ abotan mu nkyerɛwee da no adi sɛ efii ase wɔ 5000 BC!

translation.en: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
translation.sw: Ski a wɔde hyɛ wɔn nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma so fii ase sɛ agodi anyɛ hwee koraa no wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 17 no mu, na wɔ 1861 mu no Norwayfo buee ski agodi beae a edi kan wɔ Australia.

translation.en: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
translation.sw: Baage a wɔde bɔ akyi de ski sane fa sukyerɛma so: Wɔsan frɛ saa agodi yi ski a wɔyɛ wɔ nkuraase, ski nsrahwɛ anaa ski a wɔde nantew kɔ akyi.

translation.en: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
translation.sw: Ɛsɛ no nanso ɛnte sɛ ski a wɔde hyɛ nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma anaa bepɔw so no, Nea edi akyire yi hia baabi a esiane na ɛsɛ sɛ ski ne mpaboa no kyekyere wo nan.

translation.en: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
translation.sw: Fa no sɛ ɔkwan a wɔde ski sane fa sukyerɛma so no ne ɔkwan a wɔn a wɔnantew kɔ kwan tenten fa so no yɛ pɛ.

translation.en: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
translation.sw: Sɛ tebea no yɛ a, wobetumi atwa kwan kɛse sen sɛ wobɛnantew ̶ nanso ɛntaa nsi sɛ wobɛkɔ ntɛm te sɛ nea wɔyɛ wɔ kurom, mmeae a esane bere a baage mbɔ w’akyi no.

translation.en: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
translation.sw: Europa yɛ asasetam a esua de nanso ɛwɔ aman bebree a ade wɔn ho.Sɛnea wɔyɛ no no, woretu kwan akɔ aman pii so no bɛkyerɛ sɛ wobɛfa visa abisade ahorow mu ne baabi a wɔhwɛ paspɔt nsɛmsɛm mu no.

translation.en: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
translation.sw: Nnanso, wɔ saa kwan yi so no,Schengen mpɔtam no yɛ adwuma te sɛ ɔman baako.

translation.en: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
translation.sw: Bere dodow a wote mpɔtam hɔ no, wobetumi atwa ɛhye no a womfa beae a wɔyɛ paspɔt nhwehwɛmu ahorow no bio.

translation.en: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
translation.sw: Saa pɛpɛɛpɛ nso na, sɛ wowɔ Schengen visa no a, ɛho renhia sɛ woyɛ visa ho nhyehyeɛ ahorow ma kurow biara a ɛwɔ Schengen mpɔtam no mu no, na ɛno boa ma wonya bere, sie sika, ne nkrataasɛm nso.

translation.en: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
translation.sw: Nkyerɛase pɔtee biara nni hɔ ma nea enti a yɛbɛka sɛ biribi akyɛ yiye.Ɛtoɔ asoeɛ binom kyerɛ sɛ nneɛma a adi bɛboro mfe 100 sɛ biribi a akyɛ yiye.

translation.en: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
translation.sw: Nkyerɛase yi gyina beae biara so, a mfe a wɔde ato so no betumi aba fam wɔ mmeae bi te sɛ North Amerika sen Europa no.

translation.en: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
translation.sw: Wɔkyerɛ sɛ nneɛma a wɔde nsa na ayɛ betumi ayɛ nneɛma a akyɛ yiye, ɛmfa ho sɛ ne mfe nkɔɔ anim te sɛ nea wɔayɛ no pii retɔn no.

translation.en: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
translation.sw: Reindeer yɛn yɛ adwuma a ɛma wonsa kɔ w’ano a ɛho hia paa wɔ Sámifo no mu na amammerɛ a ɛwɔ adwuma no ho no nso hia paa ma wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma foforo nso.

translation.en: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
translation.sw: Sɛ yɛbɛka a, ɛnyɛ Sámifo no nyinaa na wɔde wɔn ho ahyɛ Reindeer yɛn mu, mmom no na woyi nam, kɔ ahayɔ ne nea ɛtete saa, na wɔde reindeer no twe nneɛma ma wɔn.

translation.en: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
translation.sw: Nnɛ sámifo no mu dodow no ara yɛ abɛɛfo nnwuma. Nsrahwɛ yɛ ade a ehia a sika wom wɔ Sápmi, Sámi mpɔtam hɔ.

translation.en: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
translation.sw: Ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔde di dwuma wɔ mmeae bebree, ne titiriw no wɔn a wɔnyɛ Romani no mu no, wobu asɛmfua “Gypsy” sɛ atɛnnidie esaine sɛ ɛbata adwen a ɛnyɛ papa na ɛnyɛ nokware a wɔwɔ wɔ Romani ho no nti.

translation.en: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
translation.sw: Sɛ ɛkɔba sɛ wɔde kɔkɔbɔ ma wɔ ɔman a worekɔ mu no ho a, w’akwantu apɔmuden nsiakyibaa anaa w’akwantu ntwamu nsiakyibaa no ho betumi aba asɛm.

translation.en: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
translation.sw: Wobɛpɛ nso sɛ wobɛgye afotu afi aban ahorow a ɛnyɛ wo de hɔ, nanso afotu a wɔde ma no kɔ ma wɔn man mufo.

translation.en: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
translation.sw: Sɛ nhwɛso baako no, Amerikafo a wɔte Middle East no behyia tebea soronko efi Europafo anaa Arabfo ho.

translation.en: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
translation.sw: Kɔkɔbɔ a wɔde ma wɔ ɔman bi ho no yɛ amanyɔsɛm tebea a ɛrekɔ so wɔ ɔman bi so a wɔabɔ no mua.

translation.en: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
translation.sw: Adwen a wɔkyerɛ no yɛ gyasogyaso de, ɛfa biribiara ho na ne nsɛm nhyɛda nnim koraa sɛ wode toto ɛho nsɛm a emu nkyerɛkyerɛ mu dɔ a wobenya wɔ baabi foforo no a.

translation.en: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
translation.sw: Wim tebea a ano yɛ den yɛ din a wɔde ma wim tebea a ɛyɛ hu a ebetumi asɛe ade, anaa nnipa betumi ahwere wɔn nkwa.

translation.en: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
translation.sw: Wim tebea a ano yɛ den betumi asi wɔ wiase fa baabiara, na egu ahorow, a agyina asase ho adesua, sɛnea asase no te, ne wim nsakrae ahorow so.

translation.en: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
translation.sw: Mframa a ano yɛ den, asukɔtweaa, ne ogyatanaa, yɛ emu bi ne wim tebea a ano yɛ den nsonsuanso no, saa ara na osubrane, mframa gyanpantrudu, ahum a etu wɔ po so ne kyinhyiamframa ahorow ka ho.

translation.en: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
translation.sw: Wim tebea a ano yɛ den a ɛba wɔ mpɔtam bi anaa ne bere mu no bi n.

translation.en: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
translation.sw: Wotu akwantufo fo dennennen sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ nsonsuanso a wim tebea a ano yɛ den betumi anya wɔ wɔn mpɔtam no nsow esaine sɛ ebetumi aka wɔn akwantu nhyehyɛe nti.

translation.en: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
translation.sw: Ɛsɛ sɛ obi biara a ɔreyɛ nhyehyɛe sɛ ɔbɛkɔ kurow bi a wosusuw sɛ ɛhɔ yɛ baabi a ɔko si so nsrahwɛ no nya ntetee papa.

translation.en: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
translation.sw: Intanɛt so a wobɛhwehwɛ ‘baabi a ɔtan wɔ hɔ ho adesua’ betumi ama woanya adwumakuw bi a wɔwɔ wo man mu no akyirikwan.

translation.en: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
translation.sw: Adesua no bɛkyerɛkyerɛ nsɛm a yeaka ho asɛm wɔ ha mu akɔ akyi, mpɛn pii no wɔde ɔyɛkyerɛ ka ho.

translation.en: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
translation.sw: Adesua no taa di nna 2-5 na wɔde ɔyɛkyerɛ,nneɛma a ɛbɛboa ma woate ase ntɛm na ɛtɔ mmere bi a wɔkyerɛ sɛnea wɔde akode bedi dwuma.

translation.en: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
translation.sw: Nhoma ne nsɛmma nhoma a ɛfa sɛnea wobetumi atena ase wɔ nwuram abu so, nanso nhoma a efa mmeae a ako wɔ hɔ no yɛ kakraa bi.

translation.en: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
translation.sw: Ɛsɛ sɛ akwantufo a wɔreyɛ nhyehɛe sɛ wɔbɛkɔ akɔyɛ bɔbeasu nsesae opirehɛn wɔ amanɔne kura nkrataa a ɛfata a wɔbɛ san de aba.

translation.en: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
translation.sw: Ɔpɛ a aban ahorow no wɔ sɛ wɔbɛyɛ paspɔt a wonsi onii no bɔbeasu so dua (X) anaa nkrataa a wɔasakra mu ma ɛne obi din a ɔpɛ ne ne bɔbeasu ahyia no gu ahorow.

translation.en: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
translation.sw: Ɔpɛ a amanɔne aban ahorow no wɔ sɛ wobedi saa nkrataa yi so no nso gu ahorow saa ara.

translation.en: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
translation.sw: Efi Ɛbɔ da a ɛtɔ so 11 mmere no reba no,nhwehwɛmu a wɔyɛ wɔ abammɔfo gyinabea ahorow abɛyɛ mfeefeemu a ɛboro so.

translation.en: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
translation.sw: Wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔsesa wɔn bɔbeasu a wonya nyɛɛ opirehyɛn no nnhwɛ kwan sɛ wɔbɛfa afidie a wɔde hwehwɛ nnipa ho no a wɔn kokoam nsɛm ne wɔn nidie ho mma asɛm.

translation.en: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
translation.sw: Rip current yɛ asorɔkye a efi mpoano resan aba nsu no mu, mpɛn pii no wɔ baabi a ɛpo mu botan no wɔ anaa nea ɛte saa.

translation.en: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
translation.sw: Esaine sɛnea nsu ase te nti, nsu a asan n’akyi reba no ano yɛ den paa wɔ afa ahorow kakra bi a emu dɔ hɔ, na tumi a ɛyɛ nam betumi ahyehyɛ wɔ hɔ.

translation.en: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
translation.sw: Owuo a ɛtaa si no ba bere a nkurɔfo bɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbedware ahyia tumi a ɛwɔ asorɔkye a ɛresan n’akyi no, na ebetumi aba sɛ erennyɛ yiye.

translation.en: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
translation.sw: Sɛ wonya pue fi asorɔkye no a ano yɛ den no mu a, sɛ wobɛsan aguare bio no nyɛ den te sɛ kan no.

translation.en: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
translation.sw: Bɔ mmɔden sɛ wode w’ani bɛkyerɛ baabi a ɛnka wo nhyɛ bio anaa, sɛ wonim aguare anaa obi ahu wo no, wobɛpɛ sɛ wobɛtwɛn ma obi abɛgye wo.

translation.en: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
translation.sw: Ehu a ɛka wↄn bere a wↄsan ne wↄn manfo bↄ no ba ntɛm sen ehu a ɛka wↄn bere a wↄsan sua wↄn amammerɛ no, (ɛnyɛ anigyesɛm koraa) etumi kyɛ na ano tumi yɛ den paa.

translation.en: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
translation.sw: Akwantufo a anyɛ den amma wↄn sɛ wobesua afoforo amammrɛ no, ɛtↄ da a,ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛsan akↄfa wↄn de no bio.

translation.en: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
translation.sw: Sɛ wofi aburokyire ba fie a, amammerɛ foforo a woasua no ka wo hↄ na wo werɛ fi w’ankasa de no bi.

translation.en: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
translation.sw: Bere a edi kan a wutuu kwan no, ebetumi aba sɛ nkurↄfo nyaa abotare ne ntiase maa wo, efisɛ na wonim sɛ ehia sɛ akwantufo sua ↄman foforo mu amammerɛ na wↄde yɛ adwuma.

translation.en: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
translation.sw: Nnipa pii nhwɛ kwan da sɛ wↄn a wofi akwantuo mu san ba wↄn man mu no behia abotare ne ntease.

translation.en: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
translation.sw: Pyramid no dede ne kanea dwumadi no yɛ ade a ɛyɛ anika paa ma mmofra wɔ mpɔtam hɔ.

translation.en: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
translation.sw: Wubetumi ahu ahinawotwe ahorow wɔ sum mu, ɛnna wubetumi ahu wɔn a wɔayɛ dinn ansa na agoru no ahyɛ ase.

translation.en: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
translation.sw: Wutumi te nnyigyei bi fi nsrahwɛfo ne adetɔnfo no mpɛn pii no ara. Abasɛm a ɛfa nnyigyei ne kanea ho no te sɛ abasɛm nhoma ara pɛ.

translation.en: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
translation.sw: Wɔde abɔde a ne ti yɛ nipa na ne honam yɛ aboa ne ɔkasafo ma abasɛm no to akyi.

translation.en: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
translation.sw: Wɔda ahwɛe ahorow adi wɔ ahinawotwe ahorow no so nam so sosɔ ahinawotwe no.

translation.en: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
translation.sw: Aman pii no ara na wɔkyerɛ sɛ, “South Sheltland”, a wohuu no afe 1819 mu no wɔ adankora pii, a emu dunsia ɛna na wodi mu dwuma wɔ afe 2020 mu.

translation.en: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
translation.sw: Ͻkwan a ɛda “archipelago” ne “Peninsula” soro fam no yɛ kilomita no 120. Nea ɛso wom ne “King George Island” a ɛwɔ “Villa Las Estrellas”.

translation.en: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
translation.sw: Ebinom nso ne “Livingston Island”, ne “Deception” a ɛhɔ na “caldera” ogya bepɔw no ma tenabea a edi mu yiye.

translation.en: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
translation.sw: “Ellsworth Land” da “Peninsula” no anaafo fam, a “Bellingshausen” po no atwa ho ahyia.

translation.en: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
translation.sw: “Peninsula” mmepɔw no na ɛkeka bom yɛ asase yantam no, na asan nso akeka abom ayɛ “Ellsworth” mmepɔw a ɛyɛ kilomita no 360, a “Minnesota Glacier” no atware mu.

translation.en: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
translation.sw: Atifi fam anaa “Sentinel Range” no wɔ “Antarctica” mmepɔw a ɛwoware no, a wɔfrɛ no “Vinson Massif”, a ne tenten no yɛ mita no 4892 wɔ “Mount Vinson”.

translation.en: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
translation.sw: Mmea a ɛwɔ akyiri no de, sɛ wunni ahamatorofo a, ɛnde ahamatorofo a yɛasi abɛɛfo kwantempɔn dua ama no na wubetumi de adi dwuma.

translation.en: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
translation.sw: Ahamatorofo a yɛasi abɛɛfo kwantempɔn dua ama noɔ no nhyɛ da ntumi nni dwuma te sɛ ahamatorofo a wutumi de kɔ baabiara, efisɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wobɛn abɛɛfo kwantempɔn dua no ansa na wɔatumi de ahamatorofo no adi nkɔmmɔ.

translation.en: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
translation.sw: Wɔde eyi di dwuma mpɛn pii no ara wɔ nneɛma nneɛmafa a wɔde fa nsu so mu, a nsu so hyɛntwi a wɔde gyigye wɔn ani ka ho, na nsrahwɛfo a wɔwɔ deeta a ɛwɔ akyi no ka ho bi.

translation.en: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
translation.sw: Ɛsɛ sɛ onipa a odi ahamatorofo ho dwuma no bɔ mmɔden ma wuhu biribiara a ɛfa saa abɛɛfo kwantempɔn yi ho.

translation.en: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
translation.sw: Ͻkwan pa a wɔn a wɔama wɔn ho afe biako akyi bɛfa so akɔ no ne sɛ wobetu kwan na wɔakosua ade.

translation.en: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
translation.sw: Wɔn a wɔtaa yɛ eyi yɛ wɔn a wɔawie sukuu, wɔ bere a yɛregyae wɔn ama wɔatu saa anammɔn yi ansa na wɔakɔ suapɔn, na wɔnto wɔn adesua no nkyene.

translation.en: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
translation.sw: Ͻkwan pii so no, sɛ wubetu kwan akɔ ɔman foforo so akosua ade afe biako no ma wo ho kwan ma sɛ woba wo man mu a, wutumi kɔ w’anim wɔ wo sukuukɔ no mu.

translation.en: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
translation.sw: Nea ɛwɔ ho ne sɛ, ehia sɛ wutua adekyerɛ sika wɔ saa adesua nhyehyɛe yi mu.

translation.en: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
translation.sw: Finland yɛ beae soronko bi a, hyɛmma kɔ edi pa ara. Beae a “ Atadeɛ pii wowɔ” na ɛwowɔ anweatam pii nso, ɛwɔ atadeɛ no mu ɛwɔ archipelago mpoano.

translation.en: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
translation.sw: Wɔ archipelago ne atadeɛ mu no de nyɛ ketee sɛ wonya yacht.

translation.en: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
translation.sw: Ɛwom sɛ archipelago mpaono ne atare akɛse no kɛse yɛ ma yacht biara de, hyɛmma nketewa anaa mpo kayak ɛma suahunu soronko koraa.

translation.en: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
translation.sw: Hyɛmma mu tena yɛ anigyedeɛ a atwam wɔ Findland, na hyɛmma biara wɔ nnipa nson anaa nwɔtwe.

translation.en: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
translation.sw: Yei ne Norway, Sweden ne New Zealand hyia, nanso kwan fofooro da nso koraa. (s.e. Wɔ Nethaland no, ɛfi biako kɔsi aduanan).

translation.en: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
translation.sw: “Baltic Cruises” ahorow no pii no ara wɔ “St. Petersburg” a ɛwɔ Russia.

translation.en: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
translation.sw: Eyi kyerɛ sɛ wubetumi atu nna binom asi hɔ akɔ saa tete nkurow yi so wɔ bere a woreba wo nkyi na woreda suhyɛn no mu anadwo.

translation.en: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
translation.sw: Sɛ wofa suhyɛn nketewa no bi na ɛkɔ hɔ nsrahwɛ a, ɛho nhia sɛ wubehia akwantu krataa foforo (sɛnea na wɔyɛ no afe 2009 mu no).

translation.en: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
translation.sw: Suhyɛn a wotwi de gyigye wɔn ani no bi fi Berlin ne Germany a yehu no nhoma ahorow mu. Sɛnea wuhu wɔ maapo no so no, Berlin mmɛn po no wɔ baabiara, ɛnna nsrahwɛ biara a wobɛkɔ wɔ hɔ no nka sika a wubetua de atwiw suhyɛn a wotwi de gyigye wɔn ani no.

translation.en: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
translation.sw: Wimhyɛn akwantu yɛ ade a onipa biara suro, titiriw sɛ nnipa no mfaa winhyɛn ntuu kwan anaa wɔapira da a.

translation.en: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
translation.sw: Ɛnyɛ ade a ɛsɛ sɛ w’ani wu wɔ ho: ɛte sɛ ehu ne ɔpɛ a nkurɔfo wɔ ma nneɛma binom a wɔwɔ no.

translation.en: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
translation.sw: Ebinom no, sɛ yɛkyerɛ wɔn ɔkwan a wimhyɛn fa so yɛ adwuma ne sɛ wɔte mu a sɛnea ɛyɛ no a, ebeyi ehu a efi nim a wonnim anaa ɛnyɛ wɔn na wotwi mu no afi wɔn mu.

translation.en: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
translation.sw: Nnwumakuw a wɔde nneɛma kɔmoma nkurɔfo no akatua ye pa ara. Mpɛn pii no, wuhia bere na wode adi w’aguadi krataa ho dwuma, wode adi gua anaa wode atɔ afiri no ho akade ahorow.

translation.en: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
translation.sw: Akwan bi so no, nnwumakuw akɛse no wɔ wɔn ankasa wimhyɛn ahorow, nanso akwan binom a aka ne nnwumakuw nketewa no de, na ɔhaw wɔ ho.

translation.en: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
translation.sw: Sɛ wɔnam wimhyɛn so na wɔde nneɛma mane a, akwan bi so no, ebetumi adi nna ansa na wɔayi nneɛma no anaa afi beae a woyi nneɛma no.

translation.en: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
translation.sw: Ͻkwan a wubetumi afa so na wo nneɛma no akɔ ntɛm ne sɛ wode nneɛma no bɛmane sɛ nneɛma a yɛahwɛ dedaw. Wimhyɛnfa nhyehyɛe no mma ho kwan sɛ wɔde nneɛma bi bɛfa wɔn so a nneɛma no wura nka ho, ɛno nti na wobehia wo no.

translation.en: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
translation.sw: Sɛ wobenya adefo afa anaa aguadifo afa atena wↄ wiemhyɛn mu a, gye sɛ wotua sika pii, (anaasɛ, wo ma w'adwumakuo tua ma wo).

translation.en: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
translation.sw: Nanso, ɛbo nna fam. Sɛnea yenim no ,ɛsɛ sɛ wo hwɛ kwan sɛ wobetua sika wↄtaa gye no ho mmↄho nan ma aguadifo afa , ɛna mmↄho du baako sɛ wopɛ adefoↄ afa hↄ nso a.

translation.en: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
translation.sw: Sɛ yɛbɛka a, ɛho nhia koraa sɛ wobesrɛ nteso bere a wopɛ sɛ wotena adefo afa anaa aguadifo afa wↄ wiemhyɛn a ennyina kwan so na ɛkↄ tee mu no.

translation.en: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
translation.sw: Wiemhyɛn adwumakuo ahorow no nim yie sɛ akwantufo bi ayɛ krado sɛ wobetua dↄla sika a emu yɛ duru sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, wobedu baabi a wↄrekↄ no ntɛm wↄ ahodwo mu, sɛ ɛbo no fata a.

translation.en: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
translation.sw: Moldova ahenkurow ne Chişinău.Wɔn kasa ankasa ne Romanian, nanso Russia kasa na wɔde di dwuma kɛse.

translation.en: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
translation.sw: Moldova yɛ ɔman a ekura mmusuakuw dodow no ara na mmusuakuw ntɔkwaw akɔ so wɔ hɔ pa ara.

translation.en: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
translation.sw: Afe 1994 mu no, saa ntɔkwaw yi maa wɔtee ankonam man a wɔfrɛ no “Transnistria Republic” a ɛwɔ Moldova apuei fam, a wɔwɔ wɔn ankasa aban ne wɔn sika a wodi, nan so “UN” nnyee wɔn ntoo mu sɛ ɔman.

translation.en: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
translation.sw: Ewom sɛ Moldova aman abien yi nni nkitaho mfa amanyɔsɛm ho de, nanso wɔwɔ twaka soronko wɔ sikasɛm fam.

translation.en: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
translation.sw: Ͻsom a ɛwɔ Moldova ne “Orthodox Christian”.

translation.en: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
translation.sw: “Izmir” yɛ Turkey nkurow akɛse no mu biako a ɛto so abiɛsa na ekura nnipa ɔpepe 3.7, na ekura hyɛn gyinabea a ɛto so abien di “Istanbul” akyi, na akwantu ho nsɛm gyina ne nan so yiye.

translation.en: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
translation.sw: Esiane sɛ na ɛyɛ “Smyma” tete kurow no nti, abɛyɛ beae a egyina ne nan so ma aguadi, na wɔasi wɔ ɛpo faka ho na mmepɔw atwa ho ahyia.

translation.en: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
translation.sw: Wɔde nkyɛnsee a wɔde bɔ dan so kɔkɔɔ, mfe ɔha a ɛto so 18 gua, ne tete nkramodan ne asɔredan na ayɛ kwantempɔn akɛse a nnua wɔ nkyɛnkyɛn, adan a wɔde nhwehwɛ na ayɛ anim ne ɛnne mmere yi aguadibea ahorow no de, nanso saa kurowpɔn yi kura “Mediterranean Europe” atenka no bi sen tete “Turkey” no.

translation.en: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
translation.sw: “Haldarsvik” kurow ketewa no da “Eysturoy” supɔw no adi, san nso wɔ asɔredan a ekura afa awotwe nwanwaso bi.

translation.en: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
translation.sw: Asɔredan no mu no, wuhu mmorɔnomaa ahoni a wɔde asisi dammoa so.

translation.en: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
translation.sw: Dɔnhwerew fa mpo a wubenya de anantew saa kurow ketewa yi mu no yɛ ade a ɛsom bo yiye.

translation.en: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
translation.sw: Atifi fam ne beae a wobɛto no kan no yɛ anigye kurow “Sintra” a ebegyee din ɛnam akwantufo a wofiri aman foforo so baa hɔ ne ɛhɔ nnepa ahorow a “Lord Byron” kyerɛw ho asɛm too hɔ no nti.

translation.en: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
translation.sw: “Scotturb Bus 403” kɔ “Sintra” da biara a, egyina wɔ “Cabo da Roca”.

translation.en: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
translation.sw: Bio, atifi fam hɔ na yehu “Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima” (bosomdan) kɛse no, beae a “Marian” saman mfoni a agye din wɔ wiase afanan nyinaa wɔ no.

translation.en: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
translation.sw: Yɛsrɛ wo, hyɛ no nso sɛ worekɔ beae a wosie nnipa pii no ara, na san nso hu no sɛ saa beae yi yɛ beae a wiase afanan nnipa mu fa kɛse a yentumi nkan wɔn na yɛasie wɔn wɔ hɔ.

translation.en: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
translation.sw: Yɛwɔ mmarima ne mmea a wɔte ase nnɛ mmere yi a wonyaa wɔn ti didii mu wɔ saa beae yi, ɛnna nnipa binom nso a wokumm wɔn adɔfo anaa wɔde wɔn yɛɛ adwuma maa wowuwuu wɔ hɔ, a Yudafo ne wɔn a wɔnyɛ Yudafo nso ka ho.

translation.en: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
translation.sw: Yɛsrɛ wo, bɔ mmɔden fa anuonyam, anibere ne nidi a ɛfata ma saa beae yi. Ɛmfa “Holocaust” anaa “Nazis” nni agoru.

translation.en: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
translation.sw: Ɛnsensan anaa ɛnkyerɛw adan a ɛwɔ hɔ no ho mfa ngu beae yi ho fi.

translation.en: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
translation.sw: “Catalan” ne “Spanish” ne Barcelona kasa. Nnipa a wɔwɔ Barcelona no mu fa ani gye ho sɛ wɔka “Catalan”, nnipa pii no ara te ase, ɛnna obiara nso te “Spanish” kasa no

translation.en: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
translation.sw: Mmom, akwankyerɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne ahorow no nyinaa yɛ ade a wɔakyerɛw wɔ “Calatan” mu, efisɛ saa kasa yi na wɔagye ato mu sɛ Barcelona kasa a edi kan.

translation.en: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
translation.sw: Nanso, “Spanish” kasa no yɛ kasa a wɔde di dwuma pa ara yiye wɔ amansan afiri ne akade afoforo mu.

translation.en: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
translation.sw: Daadaa nkaebɔ a wɔde to gua wɔ keteke mu no yɛ ade a wɔka no wɔ “Calatan” kasa mu, nanso nsɛm bi a wɔnhyehyɛɛ ho sɛ wɔde reto gua no de, afiri a ɛno ankasa tumi kasa a onipa biara nni ho dwuma no na ɛnam Spanish, English, French, Arabic ne Japanese kasa so de to gua.

translation.en: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
translation.sw: “Parisians” ahopɛ, ade a wommu ne wɔn ahomaso nti, nnipa nim wɔn pa ara.

translation.en: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
translation.sw: Ewom sɛ saa adwen a wɔwɔ fa wɔn ho yi nyɛ ade a ɛte saa pɛpɛɛpɛ de, nanso sɛ wopɛ sɛ wokɔ so ara tena Paris de a, ɛnde ɛsɛ sɛ woda wo suban pa adi, wɔ bere a woreyɛ wo sɛ wɔtetee wo yiye. Ɛbɛma asetena wɔ hɔ no ayɛ mmerɛw ama wo.

translation.en: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
translation.sw: “Parisians” nneyɛe no da adi prɛko pɛ wɔ bere a wobɛda nneyɛe pa ketewa bi adi akyerɛ wɔn.

translation.en: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
translation.sw: “Plitvice” ɔtare no agopramma no afuw yiye a “beech”, “spruce”, ne “fir” nnua na ahyɛ mu ma, ɛnna ɛsan nso wɔ “Alpine” ne “Mediterranean” nnua a adi afra.

translation.en: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
translation.sw: Ɛwɔ nnua nkurowtow pii ɛnam wim nsakrae kyerɛpɛn, nsase ahorow ne sorokɔ ahorow no nti.

translation.en: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
translation.sw: Beae yi nso yɛ tenabea ma mmoa ne nnomaa ahorow pii.

translation.en: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
translation.sw: Mmoa binom a wɔn ho yɛ na te sɛ Aborɔfo osisi a n’ahosu yɛ dodowee, sakraman, ɔkɔre, ɔpatu, wuram agyinamoa, agyinamoabiri, wuram akokɔ ne mmoa a wɔtete sɛɛ ahorow pii na wɔwɔ saa beae yi

translation.en: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
translation.sw: Sɛ wɔrekɔ nkokorafi hɔ a, ɛsɛ sɛ mmea no bɔ mmɔden hyɛ fam atade a ɛhata wɔn kotodwe na wɔsan nso hata wɔn mmatiri ho.

translation.en: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
translation.sw: Wɔwɔ ntade a wɔde ma mmea a wɔansiesie wɔn ho ansa na wɔreba nkokorafi hɔ no, nanso sɛ wode fam atade no bi a ahosu ahorow a ewom no hyerɛn pii ba de a, ɛnde ɔbarima anaa ɔbea somfo no bɛnwenenwene akyerɛ wo wɔ kwan no ano.

translation.en: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
translation.sw: Ɛsɛ sɛ mmarima nso di saa nhyehyɛe koro yi so hyɛ ntwontwo a ɛhata wɔn nkotodwe.

translation.en: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
translation.sw: Wubetumi nso afɛm saa ntade yi bi wɔ kwan no ano ahyɛ, nanso fam atade a yɛahyɛ na yensii de, ebia na wohyɛ a wo ho antɔ wo. Atade biako no kɔ mmarima nyinaa!

translation.en: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
translation.sw: “Majorcan” nnuan a wɔnoa a ɛne ɔkwan a mmeae bi a ɛwɔ Mediterranean yɛ pɛ no de paano, atosode ne mogya nam (titiriw prakonam) na ɛyɛ, ɛnna wɔde ngo a efi ngodua mu na edi dwuma fi aduannoa no ase de kosi awiei.

translation.en: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
translation.sw: Aduan a ɛho asɛnka nyɛ den a wɔtaa di no ahuhuru bere ne “Pa amb Oli”: paano ne ngo a efi ngodua mu, ntoosi, ne nneɛma bi a wɔde bɛto aduan no mu nkyene bi te sɛ nufusu aduan, mpunam, ne nea ɛkeka ho.

translation.en: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
translation.sw: Nsɛmfua a efi edin nsɛmfuakuw no mu ne “Sie” nyinaa de akyerɛwde kɛse na ɛhyɛ ase, mpo sɛ wopue wɔ ɔkasamu no mfimfini a.

translation.en: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
translation.sw: Eyi ne ɔkwan soronko a wubetumi afa so akyerɛ nsonsonoe a ɛda adeyɛ nsɛm ne ayɛde ahorow ntam.

translation.en: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
translation.sw: Ewom sɛ akyerɛw no yɛ den kakra wɔ bere a worehwɛ sɛ adeyɛ asɛm anaa edin nkyerɛkyerɛmu bi betu adi dwuma sɛ edin asɛm de, nanso ɛboa ma akenkan yɛ mmerɛw.

translation.en: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
translation.sw: Sɛnea wɔbɔ nsɛmfua so wɔ Italy kasa mu no nyɛ den, efisɛ sɛnea wɔbɔ nsɛmfua no so ne sɛnea wɔkyerɛw nsɛmfua no nyinaa yɛ pɛ

translation.en: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
translation.sw: Akyerɛwde titiriw a ɛsɛ sɛ wohwɛ no yiye ne “c” ne “g”, efisɛ ɛnne nnyigyei a ɛtoa saa akyerɛwde abien yi mu biara so no tumi sesa ɔkwan a ɛsɛ sɛ wofa so bɔ so..

translation.en: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
translation.sw: Bio, hwɛ sɛ wobɛma nsonsonoe aba ɔkwan a wofa so bɔ “r” ne “rr” no so: “caro” kyerɛ ɔdɔfo, ɛnna “carro” nso kyerɛ teaseɛnam.

translation.en: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
translation.sw: Persian kasa no yɛ kasa a ne kasa mmara ho asɛnka nyɛ den, na esisi so wɔ ɔkwan pɔtee bi so.

translation.en: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
translation.sw: Ɛno nti, sɛ wusua saa ɔkasa mmara nhoma yi a, ɛbɛboa ama woasua pii no ara afa Persian kasa mmara no ho asan nso ate wɔn kasasin ahorow no ase yiye.

translation.en: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
translation.sw: Ɛyɛ nokware sɛ, sɛ wunim Romance kasa bi a, ɛbɛboa wo ama woasua Portuguese kasa no a wommerɛw ho.

translation.en: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
translation.sw: Mmom, nnipa a wɔka Spanish kasa no tutu mmirika ka se Portuguese kasa no bɛn Spanish kasa no dodo, enti ɛho nhia sɛ wobeyi Portuguese kasa no asi nkyɛn asua.

translation.en: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
translation.sw: Wɔayi tete mmeae ahorow a na wɔkɔ hɔ kɔhwɛ wim abɔde ahorow no tokyene, ama seesei saa mmeae no abɛdane mmeae a wɔde nkaedum ahorow gu hɔ anaa mmeae a wɔkɔ hɔ kosua ade.

translation.en: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
translation.sw: Ewom sɛ nkanea a egyina so tɛnn no nyɛ ade a na egyina ne nan so te sɛ nnɛ de, nanso yehu wɔ kurowpɔn anaa sukuu ahorow mu, a na ɛho nyɛ den sɛ wubehu bi sen nnɛ bere yi mu.

translation.en: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
translation.sw: Ɛnnɛ mmere yi nhwehwɛmu afiri a wɔde twa mfoni no abu so wɔ nkurow a ɛwowɔ akyiri a wokura wim a nnipa ani gye ho so.

translation.en: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
translation.sw: Efi mfe ɔha a ɛto so 8 no, Hanami abɛyɛ Japan amammere no mu biako.

translation.en: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
translation.sw: Saa nhyehyɛe yi fi China na ɛbae wɔ bere a aduaba a ayɛ sɛ ɔbow na etumi nyin frɔmfrɔm no bɛyɛɛ nhwiren a nnipa ani gye ho.

translation.en: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
translation.sw: Japan man mu no, ɔhempɔn ne aberempɔn ahorow a wodi wɔn dwuma wɔ Imperial Court no ɛna na wɔwɔ “cherry” aduaba a ɛsoe pa ara no.

translation.en: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
translation.sw: Tɛw ahorow nyin yiye wɔ beae a ɛhɔ yɛ frɔmfrɔm, ɛno nti ɛmmɔ wo ho mmusu ntu tɛw no mu biara sɛso “biako pɛ” mpo mfi hɔ.

translation.en: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
translation.sw: Sɛ worewura afikyifuw bi a wɔayɛ no kama a, sɛ wutu “tɛw no mu biara sɛso” wɔ bere a wunnii ho nkɔmmɔ nkyerɛɛ obiara a, wotumi pam wo.

translation.en: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
translation.sw: Singapore yɛ beae pa a wubetumi atu kwan akɔ hɔ na wubetumi atu anammɔn ahorow, asan nso anya biribiara atɔ wɔ bere a wubedu hɔ.

translation.en: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
translation.sw: Nanso sɛ wɔde wo to “nhimahobea” a ɛwɔ atifi fam wɔ mmeae a awia bɔ pa ara no a, ɛsɛ sɛ wode hyɛ w’adwen mu sɛ wo ne ɔhyew (a da biara egyina mu) ne awia kataban ( a sɛ wim tew a ɛnhyɛ da mmɔ no) bedi asi.

translation.en: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
translation.sw: Lɔre binom nso a kɔ Hebron atifi fam a ɛyɛ asiei ma Kyerɛw Kronkron mu nnipa binom te sɛ Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, ne wɔn yerenom.

translation.en: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
translation.sw: Hwɛ sɛ lɔre a woadwene sɛ worekɔfa no yɛ nea ɛde wo bɛkɔ Hebron ankasa, na ɛmfa wo nkosi Yuda tenabea a wɔfrɛ no Kiryat Araba a ɛbɛn hɔ no.

translation.en: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
translation.sw: Nsase a ɛwɔ nsu ho no nso yɛ mmeae a wobetumi akɔ hɔ akwamma.

translation.en: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
translation.sw: Mmeae a wubetumi akɔ hɔ no bi ho nhwɛso ne abankɛse ahorow a ɛwɔ Loire Valley, Rhine Valley, anaasɛ wubetumi nso akɔ kuropɔn ahorow bi so wɔ Danube anaa wubetumi nso akɔ korowtwiw wɔ Erie Canal.

translation.en: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
translation.sw: Wotumi nso kyerɛ akwan a nnipa pii no ara nim sɛ wɔnante so ne nea wotwiw dade pɔnkɔ wɔ so.

translation.en: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
translation.sw: Buronya yɛ a afahyɛ soronko a yehu wɔ Kristosom mu, na wode kae Yesu awoda.

translation.en: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
translation.sw: Amanne ahorow a wɔyɛ no saa afahyɛ yi mu no yɛ ade a wiasefo a wɔwɔ aman a Kristosom wɔ hɔ ne aman a Kristosom nni hɔ wɔ wiase afanan de wɔn ho awura mu.

translation.en: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
translation.sw: Wɔwɔ amanne bi a wɔyɛ no wɔ Yesu Wuda Afahyɛ no anwummire a ɛma ho kwan ma nnipa no siri pɛ wɔ petee mu ma ade kye wɛɛ sɛnea wobehu awia a ebepue adekyee no.

translation.en: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
translation.sw: Wɔwɔ anyamesɛm ho nimdeɛ nkyerɛmu a wɔde ma saa amanne yi, nanso ebetumi ayɛ amanne a egyina hɔ ma Ͻbra Foforo ne Abaso wɔ Kristosom mu.

translation.en: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
translation.sw: Nsɔre pii no ara siri pɛ Memeneda anadwo wɔ Yesu Wuda Afahyɛ no mu, na ɔdasum mu no, asɔre mma no abɔ dede de akyerɛ wɔn ani a agye wɔ Yesu sɔre a wasɔre no ho.

translation.en: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
translation.sw: Aguare, otu anaa nsu ani tɛn na mmoa a wɔwɔ supɔw no mu nyinaa faa so bepuee hɔ.

translation.en: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
translation.sw: Ͻkwan tenten no nti, mmoadoma no antumi amfi asasepɔn no mu amma hɔ maa akyekyere kɛse bɛyɛɛ aboa a otumi kyinkyin wɔ Galapagos supɔw no mu.

translation.en: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
translation.sw: Nnipa asetena wɔ Galapagos supɔw no mu no nam so de mmoa binom te sɛ mpɔnkye, apɔnkɔ, anantwi, nkusi ne nkraman aba hɔ.

translation.en: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
translation.sw: Sɛ wokɔ awɔw beae a ɛwɔ atifi fam anaa awɔw beae a ɛwɔ anaafo fam wɔ awɔw bere mu a, wubehyia adesae a egyina mu boro dɔnhwerew aduonu-anan, a ɛkyerɛ sɛ awia mmɔ ntra beae a ewi ne asase hyia no.

translation.en: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
translation.sw: Eyi ma kwan ma wuhu “Aurora Borealis” no, wɔ bere a wim ayɛ tumm kakra bere biara.

translation.en: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
translation.sw: Nnipa nhyɛ da nnɔɔso wɔ saa mmeae yi, na nkanea nso nnyina so tɛnn no nti, wim nsoromma nso bɛma w’ani agye.

translation.en: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
translation.sw: Japan adwumayɛ yɛ nnidiso nnidiso san nso yɛ nea mpanyimfo agye atom a ɛnyɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ Europe no nso ade foforo.

translation.en: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
translation.sw: Soro atade yɛ adwuma atade a wɔagye atom na adwumayɛfo de wɔn abusuadin anaa wɔn adwumayɛdin na ɛfrɛ wɔn ho.

translation.en: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
translation.sw: Nkabom wɔ adwumayɛ mu hia, na ɛho hia sɛ nnipa no bɛka wɔn ho abom ayɛ adwuma yiye sen sɛ wɔbɛbɔ nnipa mmiako mmiako aba so wɔ adwuma pa bi a wɔayɛ ho.

translation.en: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
translation.sw: Ɛsɛ sɛ adwumayɛfo bɔ mmɔden gye tumi fi wɔn mpanyimfo hɔ wɔ agyinae a wosi ho, na wɔhwɛ sɛ wobedi nea mpanyimfo no ka biara so a wommisa ho asɛm biara.
